Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Laser designator power fluctuation. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Weapon Release component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 24/09/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh
